= Sonnet 4.6 v +)

That’s an interesting design challenge! A few
thoughts:

The core issue is that I’m fundamentally
reactive — I sit and wait for input. To make
me “initiate” you'd essentially need some
external trigger, like a scheduler or
background process that pings me at set
times or based on certain conditions, then
surfaces that to the user as if I started the
conversation.

Some possible approaches depending on
what you're going for:

A time-based trigger — a cron job or
schedu...
